name: NavalArt
description: Design your own warships, equip them with a variety of armament, and bring them out to the ocean!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
